title: STAT+: Pharmalittle: We’re reading about Super Bowl drug ads, an FTC deal with Express Scripts, and more
description: Based on ads released in advance of the Super Bowl, little has changed in the eyes of the pharma industry since the FDA began a "crackdown" on drug marketing
content: Based on ads released in advance of the Super Bowl, little has changed in the eyes of the pharma industry since the FDA began a "crackdown" on drug marketing
